timeline.bodyText: The code doesn't compile, that should be return new ComposableIndexTemplate(this). Also as mentioned above we should use one of the existing constructors.
timeline.author: swallez

timeline.bodyText: If you look at other uses of the builder pattern, their build method calls one of the regular constructors of the class. This avoids having to add an additional constructor just for the builder.
timeline.author: swallez

timeline.message: #60750 Modifying test cases to use ComposableIndexTemplate.Builder
